channel.title: Object and NPC Clipping! (Walking through walls etc..) Please help! Rep++!
channel.description:
I've looked many places and can't seem to find a tutorial that can fix my problem.
I need to fix my server (but I heard the problem was client sided?) [b]so players can't follow each other and walk through objects like walls etc.[/b]
If someone could help me out on this it would be tremendously appreciated and you will receive a rep++ in return.
